name: tm42
effect: Teaches Facade to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Facade to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II & I: Dream Eater)

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Raises ATTACK when
poisoned, burned,
or paralyzed.

has a burn.

flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user attacks everything around it by causing an
explosion. The user faints upon using this move.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
This attack move’s power is doubled if the user has
been hurt by the opponent in the same turn.
